alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 08 at 1:29PM EDT until July 08 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 129 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Greensboro and McLeansville. This includes the following flood prone locations... Latham Park near North Buffalo Creek, Wendover Ave near Latham Park and Muddy Creek at Bessemer Ave near US-29. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
